page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: We did a family survey on jobs in our village,to find out the most popular jobs,and how many people did each job.First we wrote down questions and then asked the children them.We put the results on the computer.Then asked the computer how many people have the same job and what percent.These are the results.26 men are miners which = 45%.4 men are unemployed which = 7%. 4 men work at the GlassBulbs which = 7%.The others did many differnt jobs. 20 mothers are house_wifes which = 35%,and 3 mothers work at the glass bulb factory a figure of 5%(approx.) Again the others did many different things.I was surprised that in our survey only three women worked at the Glass Bulbs as they do employ a lot of women there.
